results.title: Deep Learning for Automatic Detection of Atrial Fibrillation from Short-Term ECG Segments
results.abstract: We propose a novel deep learning approach for detecting atrial fibrillation from short-term ECG segments using residual networks and attention mechanisms. Our method achieves 94.5% accuracy on PhysioNet AF dataset and can detect AF episodes as short as 5 seconds.

results.title: Transformer-Based Models for Sequence-to-Sequence ECG Analysis in Atrial Fibrillation
results.abstract: This paper presents a transformer-based architecture for analyzing ECG sequences in patients with atrial fibrillation. The model can classify rhythm patterns, predict AF termination, and identify optimal timing for interventions.
